Description.Name: LongTom Cluster Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Cluster ammunition splits into mutliple sub-munitions before impact, covering a bigger area, but with less concentrated explosives.

Long Tom Cluster Ammo (Triple) Bins each contain 20 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
